page.title: 10EDUCATION- School Log Book 1
page.content:
{8th.January,1985. } Pre-briefing meeting reference a major building programme to re-model the school, providing a hall, indoor toilets and classrooms to replace the two mobile rooms.
{15th.January,1985.} Oil heating system failed today; engineer called to find that the oil had waxed in the extremely low temperatures. Parent-teacher Association meeting; plans to replace the traditional Christmas Fair with a Barn Dance discussed.
{21st.March,1985.} Upper Infant class visited Liverpool Museum to study the Egyptology exhibition, accompanied by a large group of parents.
